Description:
Ruffles<sup>®</sup> is Canada’s favourite ridged potato chip brand - delivering big, satisfying crunch and mouth-watering taste!

Whether you are kicking back, watching the game with your friends or having a legendary tail-gate party – Ruffles<sup>®</sup> ridged potato chips will be a hit with all of your family and friends.

When you’re on the verge of an epic adventure, make sure you’ve got the right snack to take it to the next level. Just know that when it comes to flavour, Ruffles<sup>®</sup> has your back!
